# Carga de librerías y de datos.
```{r}
install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)
mpg %>% glimpse
```

# Pregunta 1

```{r}
mpg %>% select(c(manufacturer)) %>%
  mutate(manufacturer=str_to_title(manufacturer)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=manufacturer))+
  geom_bar(fill="blue")+
  coord_flip()+
  labs(x="Fabricante", y="Número de vehículos")
  
```
